name: Add New Model
about: Request or propose adding a new AI model to the benchmark
title: "[Model] Add "
labels: model-request
assignees: ''
---

**Model name and provider**
e.g. GPT-5, Claude 4 Opus, Gemini 2.5 Pro

**API access**
- Provider API or OpenRouter?
- Is it publicly available?
- Any special requirements (beta access, waitlist, etc.)?

**Why this model?**
Why should it be included in the benchmark?

**Sample output (optional)**
If you've tested it with the MineBench prompt format, paste the JSON output or a screenshot of the rendered build.
